item.description:
It's being great having folks share how they're doing & providing encouragement to each other.
At our May meetup, let's continue to check-in on how we're doing moving towards manifesting our "Be-Do-Have" intentions using Law Of Attraction (LOA). Please come prepared to share so we can support and learn from each other.

When you learn more about the Law Of Attraction, you can't help but become immersed in the "teachings of Abraham" about LOA. Esther Hicks, a best-selling author and an inspirational speaker, says she dialogues with or "channels" a group of spiritual teachers collectively known as "Abraham."

Join us to listen to excerpts of the dialogs and discuss your impressions & experiences using LOA as taught by Abraham.





Note: A $5.00 attendance fee is requested to cover appetizers, drinks, admin, guest facilitator etc..

group.name: The Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston Law of Attraction MAY Meeting
